link: https://chinadigitaltimes.net/chinese/2010/03/美国过分推动“翻墙”术可能适得其反_缥缈孤鸿_百/
title: 美国过分推动“翻墙”术可能适得其反_缥缈孤鸿_百度空间
content: Internet censorship is an increasingly hot topic for U.S. legislators, a group of whom announced the launch of a Global Internet Freedom Caucus on Wednesday to highlight the issue and develop legislation. …
